CustomField.formula: ((Pipeline_Amount__c >=1000000 && End_User__r.Country_Region__c == 'Americas' && text(SBU__c) = 'ATR' && (RecordType.Name == 'AM Standard' || RecordType.Name == 'AM Complex' || RecordType.Name == 'ATR Channel' )&& CloseDate > DATE(2019,1,1) && End_User__r.ATR_Channel_Partner__c == false && End_User__r.BGA_Account__c == false && End_User__r.D_S_Channel_Partner__c == false && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Cancelled')) && Is_HAT__c == false) || (Pipeline_Amount__c >=500000 && (End_User__r.Country_Region__c == 'Asia/Pacific Rim' || End_User__r.Country_Region__c == 'Europe/MiddleEast/Africa/India') && text(SBU__c) = 'ATR' && (RecordType.Name == 'AM Standard' || RecordType.Name == 'AM Complex' || RecordType.Name == 'ATR Channel') && CloseDate > DATE(2019,1,1) && End_User__r.ATR_Channel_Partner__c == false && End_User__r.BGA_Account__c == false && End_User__r.D_S_Channel_Partner__c == false && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Cancelled'))&& Is_HAT__c == false) || ( Pipeline_Amount__c >=40000 && text(SBU__c) = 'BGA' && RecordType.Name == 'BGA Operator' && End_User__r.ATR_Channel_Partner__c == false && End_User__r.BGA_Account__c == false && End_User__r.D_S_Channel_Partner__c == false && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Cancelled')) && Is_HAT__c == false && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Type__c, 'Completion')) && CloseDate > DATE(2019,1,1) && (End_User__r.Country_Region__c == 'Asia/Pacific Rim' || End_User__r.Country_Region__c == 'Europe/MiddleEast/Africa/India' || End_User__r.Country_Region__c == 'Americas') ) || ( Pipeline_Amount__c >=100000 && text(SBU__c) = 'D&S' && (RecordType.Name == 'D&S Standard' || RecordType.Name == 'D&S Standard FollowOn') && Account.D_S_Channel_Partner__c == false && CloseDate > DATE(2019,1,1) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Cancelled')) && Is_HAT__c == false && Account.ATR_Channel_Partner__c == false && Account.BGA_Account__c == false && ( Account.Country_Region__c == 'Asia/Pacific Rim' || Account.Country_Region__c == 'Europe/MiddleEast/Africa/India') ))
CustomField.label: Qualified Sales Survey
